org.fit.cssbox.layout
Class Viewport

java.lang.Object
  org.fit.cssbox.layout.Box
      org.fit.cssbox.layout.ElementBox
          org.fit.cssbox.layout.BlockBox
              org.fit.cssbox.layout.Viewport

public class Viewport
extends BlockBox

This class represents a browser viewport which is implemented as a special case of a block box. It differs mainly in the way the sizes are computed. Moreover, it provides the methods for margin collapsing which is done before the layout itself.

Author:
radek
